Mysteries.Name: The Resurrection
Mysteries.Event: God the Father raises Jesus from the dead

Mysteries.Name: The Ascension
Mysteries.Event: Jesus returns to his Father in heaven
Mysteries.Lesson: Hope, Desire to Ascend to Heaven

Mysteries.Name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
Mysteries.Event: The Holy Spirit comes to bring new life to the disciples
Mysteries.Lesson: Love of God, Holy Wisdom to know the truth and share it with everyone, Divine Charity, Worship of the Holy Spirit

Mysteries.Name: The Assumption of Mary
Mysteries.Event: At the end of her life on earth, Mary is taken body and soul into heaven
Mysteries.Lesson: Union with Mary and True Devotion to Mary

Mysteries.Name: The Coronation of Mary
Mysteries.Event: Mary is crowned as Queen of Heaven and Earth
Mysteries.Lesson: Perseverance and an Increase in Virtue (Trust in Mary's Intercession)
